set3.name: Astro
set3.description: Astro Champions have reduced mana cost.

sets.description: Astro Champions reduce their mana costs by 30.

set3.name: Battlecast
set3.description: Battlecast Champions, upon dealing or taking 10 instances of damage, heal if below half health, or deal magic damage to the nearest enemy if above half.

set3.name: Blademaster
set3.description: Blademasters' Basic Attacks have a chance to trigger two additional attacks against their target. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

set3.name: Blaster
set3.description: Every fourth Basic Attack from a Blaster fires additional attacks at random enemies. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks, trigger on-hit effects, and can critically hit.

set3.name: Brawler
set3.description: Brawlers gain bonus Maximum Health.

set3.name: Celestial
set3.description: All allies heal for some of the damage they deal with spells and attacks.

set3.name: Chrono
set3.description: All allies gain attack speed every few seconds.

set3.name: Cybernetic
set3.description: Cybernetic champions with at least one item gain Health and Attack Damage.

set3.name: Dark Star
set3.description: When a Dark Star champion dies they give increased damage, plus any previous stacks of this effect, to the nearest ally Dark Star champion.

set3.name: Demolitionist
set3.description: Damage from Demolitionists' spellcasts stuns their targets for a few seconds. (Once per spellcast)

sets.description: Damage from Demolitionists' spellcasts stun their targets for 1.50 seconds.

set3.name: Infiltrator
set3.innate: At the start of combat, Infiltrators move to the enemy's backline.
set3.description: Infiltrators gain Attack Speed for a few seconds at the start of combat.

sets.description: 40% Bonus Attack Speed. Refreshes on Takedown.
80% Bonus Attack Speed. Refreshes on Takedown.
120% Bonus Attack Speed. Refreshes on Takedown.

set3.name: Mana-Reaver
set3.description: Mana-Reavers' Basic Attacks increase the mana cost of their target's next spellcast by a percentage.

sets.description: At the start of combat, three random Mech-Pilots are teleported into a Super-Mech. The Super-Mech has the combined Health, Attack Damage, and Traits of its pilots, as well as 3 random items from among them. When the Super-Mech dies the Pilots are ejected, granted Mana, and continue to fight.

set3.name: Mercenary
set3.innate: Upgrades for Mercenaries' spells have a chance to appear in the shop.

set3.name: Mystic
set3.description: All allies gain Magic Resistance.

sets.description: Ally Star Guardian basic attacks are converted to true damage. All other ally basic attacks are converted to magic damage.

set3.name: Protector
set3.description: Protectors shield themselves for a few seconds whenever they cast a spell. This shield doesn't stack.

set3.name: Rebel
set3.description: At the start of combat, Rebels gain a shield and bonus damage for each adjacent Rebel. The shield lasts for a few seconds.

set3.name: Sniper
set3.description: Snipers deal percentage increased damage for each hex between themselves and their target.

set3.name: Sorcerer
set3.description: All allies have increased Spell Power.

set3.name: Space Pirate
set3.description: Whenever a Space Pirate lands a killing blow on a Champion there is a chance to drop extra loot.

sets.description: 50% for 1 Gold and 25% for a component item.

set3.name: Star Guardian
set3.description: Star Guardians' spellcasts grant Mana to other Star Guardians, spread among them.

set3.name: Starship
set3.innate: Starships gain mana per second, maneuver around the board, and are immune to movement impairing effects, but can't make Basic Attacks.

set3.name: Vanguard
set3.description: Vanguard champions gain bonus Armor.

set4.name: Adept
set4.description: Adepts calm the flow of battle, reducing the Attack Speed of all enemies for a few seconds at the start of combat.

set4.name: Assassin
set4.innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.
set4.description: Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance, and their spells can critically strike.

sets.description: After each combat a Blacksmith participates in, they will make progress forging an Artifact. The higher their star-level, the faster they work. Once the Artifact is complete, it will become available to bestow upon an ally. Each ally may only equip one Artifact.

set4.name: Brawler
set4.description: Brawlers gain bonus Health.

set4.name: Cultist
set4.description: Once your team loses a percentage of their Health, Galio is summoned, slamming into the largest cluster of enemies and knocking them up.

sets.description: Daredevils seek the thrill of battle, dashing after every other attack. After every dash, they shield themselves for a percentage of their max health and their next attack fires shots, gaining Style. At max Style, they cast their spell.

set4.name: Divine
set4.description: Upon attacking several times or dropping below a percentage of their Health, Divine champions ascend, taking reduced damage and dealing bonus true damage for the rest of combat.

sets.description: 35% Damage Reduction and Bonus True Damage
45% Damage Reduction and Bonus True Damage
55% Damage Reduction and Bonus True Damage
65% Damage Reduction and Bonus True Damage

set4.name: Dragonsoul
set4.description: The first Dragonsoul allies to take damage in combat receive the Dragon's Blessing. While blessed, the unit gains bonus stats, and every 5th attack fires a Dragonsoul blast, dealing a percentage of the target's maximum Health in magic damage. On death, this blessing passes to the closest Dragonsoul ally without a blessing.

sets.description: 1 Blessing, 40% Attack Speed and Spell Power
1 Blessing, 80% Attack Speed and Spell Power
1 Blessing, 160% Attack Speed and Spell Power

set4.name: Duelist
set4.description: Duelists' attacks grant Attack Speed.

set4.name: Elderwood
set4.description: Every two seconds all Elderwood champions grow, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to five times.

sets.description: 15 Armour and Magic Resist, 5 Attack Damage and Spell Power
25 Armour and Magic Resist, 10 Attack Damage and Spell Power
40 Armour and Magic Resist, 20 Attack Damage and Spell Power
The Emperor deploys with two Sand Guards who can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. They do not move or attack, and die when their Emperor does.

set4.name: Enlightened
set4.description: Enlightened champions generate more Mana.

set4.name: Executioner
set4.description: Executioner attacks and spells always critically hit targets beneath a certain Health threshold.

set4.name: Exile
set4.description: If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to a percentage of their maximum health and Lifesteal if there are two or more Exiles.

sets.description: Shield equal to 50% of their maximum health
Shield equal to 50% of their Maximum Health and 80% Lifesteal
Fabled champions' abilities are empowered from tales of their past valor.
Winning combat against a player will give bonus orbs. The longer you've gone without an orb, the bigger the payout!
Wins give an extra bonus orb with rare loot!

set4.name: Keeper
set4.description: At the start of combat, Keepers grant themselves and all nearby allies a shield for several seconds. This shield is stronger on Keepers.

set4.name: Mage
set4.description: Mages cast twice and have modified Spell Power.

set4.name: Mystic
set4.description: All allies gain Magic Resistance.

set4.name: Ninja
set4.description: Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Spell Power. This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

set4.name: Sharpshooter
set4.description: Sharpshooters attacks and spells ricochet to nearby enemies dealing reduced damage.

set4.name: Slayer
set4.description: Slayers gain Lifesteal that gets stronger as their own Health decreases, and deal bonus damage that scales up based on their target's missing Health.

sets.description: 15 to 30% Lifesteal and 20 to 45% Bonus Damage
30 to 60% Lifesteal and 35 to 80% Bonus Damage

set4.name: Spirit
set4.description: The first time a Spirit casts their spell, all allies gain Attack Speed based on the spell's mana cost.

set4.name: Syphoner
set4.description: All allies heal for some of the damage they deal with spells and attacks.

sets.description: When The Boss first drops below a percentage of his Health, he leaves combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores a percentage of his maximum Health and gives him Attack and Movement Speed. If he reaches full Health he returns to combat Pumped Up: all of his attacks and spells deal true damage. If all of his allies die, he will immediately return to combat.

set4.name: Vanguard
set4.description: Vanguard champions gain bonus Armor.

set4.name: Warlord
set4.description: Warlords have bonus Health and Spell Power. Each victorious combat they participate in increases the bonus.

set5.name: Abomination
set5.description: When allied champions have died, the Monstrosity will rise from its grave. The Monstrosity receives bonus Health and Attack Damage based on allied Abomination champions' star levels. The 3 Abomination champions nearest the grave will also grant the Monstrosity a random copy of one of their items when combat starts.

set5.name: Assassin
set5.innate: When combat starts, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.
set5.description: Assassinsâ€™ Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.

set5.name: Brawler
set5.description: Brawlers gain additional maximum Health.

sets.description: Caretakers deploy with a Baby Dragon that can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. The Baby Dragon gains a percentage of its Caretaker's Attack Speed, and restores Mana to the Caretaker upon death.

set5.name: Cavalier
set5.innate: Cavaliers charge quickly towards their target whenever they move.
set5.description: Cavaliers take reduced damage. At the start of combat and after each charge, this effect is doubled for several seconds.

sets.description: At the start of combat, the champion nearest to the center of your Coven champions is chosen as the Coven Leader, gaining bonus Ability Power. Each time a Coven champion casts, a percentage of the cost is bestowed upon the Coven Leader as Mana.

A Cruel champion hungers to be alone against exactly 1 enemy left standing. Cruel champions are purchased with Little Legend Health instead of gold. They can be sold for gold, but not Health. You're welcome.

set5.name: Dawnbringer
set5.description: Dawnbringers rapidly heal some of their maximum Health the first time they drop below a percentage of their Health. When this occurs, all allied Dawnbringers gain bonus damage.

set5.name: Draconic
set5.description: At the end of each player combat, gain a dragon egg on your bench. The bigger the egg, the longer it takes to hatch, and the rarer the reward. Golden eggs hatch into even rarer loot. In Hyper Roll, dragon eggs hatch a lot faster!

sets.description: Dragon eggs are golden! Golden eggs hatch into even rarer loot.

set5.name: Dragonslayer
set5.description: Dragonslayers always gain bonus Ability Power. After the first Dragonslayer ally scores a takedown on an enemy with certain amount of Health, all allies gain additional Ability Power for the rest of combat.

sets.description: 30% Ability Power for Dragonslayers, 20% for team
70% Ability Power for Dragonslayers, 50% for team
Wolf separates from Lamb, and can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. Wolf does not count toward your team size, and receives all of Lamb's stat bonuses.

set5.name: Forgotten
set5.description: Forgotten champions have bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. Each Shadow item held by a Forgotten champion increases these bonuses by a percentage on all Forgotten champions, stacking up several times.

sets.description:
God-Kings deal bonus damage to enemies who have at least one of their Rival Traits. This effect is only active when you have exactly 1 unique God-King. 

 Garen's Rivals: Forgotten, Nightbringer, Coven, Hellion, Dragonslayer, Abomination, Revenant. 

 Darius' Rivals: Redeemed, Dawnbringer, Verdant, Draconic, Ironclad.

set5.name: Hellion
set5.description: Hellions gain Attack Speed. Whenever a Hellion dies, a Doppelhellion (a one less star copy) will leap from the Hellion portal and join the fight!

set5.name: Invoker
set5.description: All allies gain extra Mana from their attacks.

set5.name: Ironclad
set5.description: All allies gain Armor.

set5.name: Knight
set5.description: All allies block a flat amount of damage from all sources.

set5.name: Legionnaire
set5.description: Legionnaires gain bonus Attack Speed, and their first attack after casting an Ability heals them for a percentage of the damage dealt.

set5.name: Mystic
set5.description: All allies gain Magic Resist.

set5.name: Nightbringer
set5.description: Nightbringers gain a shield for several seconds equal to a percent of their maximum Health the first time they drop below a percentage of their maximum Health. When this occurs, that Nightbringer gains bonus damage.

set5.name: Ranger
set5.description: Rangers gain and lose bonus Attack Speed periodically. This effect begins after a delay after combat starts.

set5.name: Redeemed
set5.description: Redeemed champions have increased Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power. When they die, their bonus is split among remaining Redeemed allies.

set5.name: Renewer
set5.description: Renewers heal for a percent of their maximum Health each second. If they're full Health, they restore Mana instead.

set5.name: Revenant
set5.description: Revenants revive after their first death each combat. Once revived, they take and deal increased damage.

set5.name: Skirmisher
set5.description: Skirmishers gain a shield at the start of combat, and bonus Attack Damage each second.

set5.name: Spellweaver
set5.description: Spellweavers have bonus Ability Power, which increases whenever any champion uses an ability stacking up several times.

set5.name: Verdant
set5.description: Champions that start combat adjacent to at least one Verdant ally are immune to crowd control for a duration.

set5.5.name: Abomination
set5.5.description: When 2 allied champions have died, the Monstrosity will rise from its grave, crashing into 2 champions, dealing magic damage. The Monstrosity receives bonus Health and Attack Damage based on allied Abomination champions' star levels. The 3 Abomination champions nearest the grave will also grant the Monstrosity a random copy of one of their items when combat starts.

set5.5.name: Assassin
set5.5.innate: When combat starts, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.
set5.5.description: Assassinsâ€™ Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.

set5.5.name: Brawler
set5.5.description: Brawlers gain additional maximum Health.

sets.description: Caretakers deploy with a Baby Dragon that can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. The Baby Dragon gains a percentage of its Caretaker's Attack Speed, and restores Mana to the Caretaker upon death.

set5.5.name: Cavalier
set5.5.innate: Cavaliers charge quickly towards their target whenever they move.
set5.5.description: Cavaliers take reduced damage. At the start of combat and after each charge, this effect is doubled for several seconds.

set5.5.name: Cannoneers
set5.5.description: Every 5th Cannoneer attack is replaced with a cannon shot that deals a percent of that attack's damage in an explosion around the target as physical damage.

sets.description: A Cruel champion hungers to be alone against exactly 1 enemy left standing. Cruel champions are purchased with Little Legend Health instead of gold. They can be sold for gold, but not Health. You're welcome.

set5.5.name: Dawnbringer
set5.5.description: Dawnbringers rapidly heal some of their maximum Health the first time they drop below a percentage of their Health. When this occurs, all allied Dawnbringers gain bonus damage.

set5.5.name: Draconic
set5.5.description: At the end of each player combat, gain a dragon egg on your bench. The bigger the egg, the longer it takes to hatch, and the rarer the reward. Golden eggs hatch into even rarer loot. In Hyper Roll, dragon eggs hatch a lot faster!

sets.description: Dragon eggs are golden! Golden eggs hatch into even rarer loot.

set5.5.name: Forgotten
set5.5.description: Forgotten champions have bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. Each Shadow item held by a Forgotten champion increases these bonuses by a percentage on all Forgotten champions, stacking up several times.

set5.5.name: Hellion
set5.5.description: Hellions gain Attack Speed. Whenever a Hellion dies, a Doppelhellion (a one less star copy) will leap from the Hellion portal and join the fight!

sets.description: At the start of combat, Inanimate champions summon Harrowing Mist in all adjacent hexes surrounding them for several seconds, granting all allies within damage reduction while they remain within the mist.

set5.5.name: Invoker
set5.5.description: All allies gain extra Mana from their attacks.

set5.5.name: Ironclad
set5.5.description: All allies gain Armor.

set5.5.name: Knight
set5.5.description: All allies block a flat amount of damage from all sources.

set5.5.name: Legionnaire
set5.5.description: Legionnaires gain bonus attack speed and heal for a portion of the damage they deal with attacks and abilities.

set5.5.name: Mystic
set5.5.description: All allies gain Magic Resist.

set5.5.name: Nightbringer
set5.5.description: Nightbringers gain a shield for several seconds equal to a percent of their maximum Health the first time they drop below a percentage of their maximum Health. When this occurs, that Nightbringer gains bonus damage.

set5.5.name: Ranger
set5.5.description: Rangers gain and lose bonus Attack Speed periodically. This effect begins after a delay after combat starts.

set5.5.name: Redeemed
set5.5.description: Redeemed champions have increased Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power. When they die, their bonus is split among remaining Redeemed allies.

set5.5.name: Renewer
set5.5.description: Renewers heal for a percent of their maximum Health each second. If they're full Health, they restore Mana instead.

set5.5.name: Revenant
set5.5.description: Revenants revive after their first death each combat. Once revived, they take and deal increased damage.

set5.5.name: Sentinel
set5.5.description: At start of combat, the Sentinel with the highest Health gains a shield that grants Attack Speed each time it is applied. When the shield is destroyed or expires it will pass to the ally with the lowest percent Health.

set5.5.name: Skirmisher
set5.5.description: Skirmishers gain a shield at the start of combat, and bonus Attack Damage each second.

sets.description: 20% Max Health Shield and +3 Attack Damage
40% Max Health Shield and +8 Attack Damage
100% Max Health Shield and +16 Attack Damage

set5.5.name: Spellweaver
set5.5.description: Spellweavers have bonus Ability Power, which increases whenever any champion uses an ability stacking up several times.

sets.description: When Victorious champions score a kill, their next attack is empowered to deal a percentage of the target's missing Health as bonus magic damage.

set6.name: Academy
set6.description: Academics have bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. They also learn from their allies, gaining and additional bonus whenever an ally casts their Ability.

sets.description: 18 Attack Damage and Ability Power; 3 from allies' casts
40 Attack Damage and Ability Power; 5 from allies' casts
50 Attack Damage and Ability Power; 10 from allies' casts
70 Attack Damage and Ability Power; 15 from allies' casts

set6.name: Arcanist
set6.description: Arcanists increase the Ability Power of your team.

sets.description: Your team gains 20% Ability Power, Arcanists gain 40%
Your team gains 50% Ability Power, Arcanists gain 50%

set6.name: Assassin
set6.description: Innate: When combat starts, Assassins leap to the enemy backline. Assassins' Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

set6.name: Bodyguard
set6.description: Bodyguards have increased Armor. Shortly after combat begins, Bodyguards gain a shield and taunt adjacent enemies, forcing them to attack the Bodyguard.

set6.name: Bruiser
set6.description: Your team gains bonus maximum Health. Bruisers gain double the bonus.

set6.name: Challenger
set6.description: Challengers get bonus Attack Speed. Upon scoring a takedown, Challengers dash to a new target and double this bonus for 2.5 seconds.

set6.name: Chemtech
set6.description: After dropping below 75% Health, Chemtech champions gain 20% damage reduction, Attack Speed, and regenerate % of their maximum Health for 8 seconds.

set6.name: Clockwork
set6.description: Your team has increased Attack Speed, with an increase per augment in the Hexcore.

set6.name: Colossus
set6.description: Innate: Colossi are bigger, more powerful, and immune to crowd control effects. However, each Colossus requires 2 team slots.

set6.name: Cuddly
set6.description: 1At the start of combat, Yuumi attaches herself to the nearest ally, or the the lowest Health ally after being unattached for 2 seconds. Attaching to an ally grants them a shield equal to 60% of Yuumi's maximum Health. Yuumi detaches if the shield breaks. While attached, Yuumi is untargetable and cannot attack, but gains 5 Mana per second, and 10 Mana whenever the ally attacks.

sets.description: At the start of combat, Yuumi attaches herself to the nearest ally, or the the lowest Health ally after being unattached for 2 seconds. Attaching to an ally grants them a shield equal to 60% of Yuumi's maximum Health. Yuumi detaches if the shield breaks. While attached, Yuumi is untargetable and cannot attack, but gains 5 Mana per second, and 10 Mana whenever the ally attacks.

set6.name: Enchanter
set6.description: Your team has bonus Magic Resist. Enchanters gain bonus healing and shielding.

set6.name: Enforcer
set6.description: Enforcers stun enemies at the start of combat. They break free after 5 seconds, or after losing 40% or their maximum Health.

sets.description: The enemy who has the most Health
The enemy who dealt the most damage last combat

set6.name: Glutton
set6.description: 1An ally can be fed to Tahm Kench once per planning phase, permanently granting him either Attack Damage, Ability Power, Health, Armor, or Magic Resist. To feed, hold and ally over Tahm Kench until his mouth opens, then release.

sets.description: An ally can be fed to Tahm Kench once per planning phase, permanently granting him either Attack Damage, Ability Power, Health, Armor, or Magic Resist. To feed, hold and ally over Tahm Kench until his mouth opens, then release.

set6.name: Imperial
set6.description: At the start of combat, the Imperial who dealt the most damage last combat becomes the Tyrant. The Tyrant deals bonus damage. When the Tyrant dies, the Imperial who has dealt the most damage this combat becomes the new Tyrant.

sets.description: The Tyrant deals 135% bonus damage and the other Imperials deal 75% bonus damage

set6.name: Innovator
set6.description: Innovators build a mechanical companion to join the battle.

set6.name: Mercenary
set6.description: Gain a treasure chest that opens when you win combat against a player. At the start of each planning phase vs a player, dice rolls add loot to the chest. The longer you've gone without opening the chest, the luckier the dice.

sets.description: Upon winning, roll a 3rd dice that grants bonus loot.

set6.name: Mutant
set6.description: Mutants gain unique bonuses. These are different each game.

set6.name: Protector
set6.description: Protectors shield themselves for 4 seconds whenever they cast an Ability. This shield doesn't stack.

set6.name: Scholar
set6.description: Your team gains Mana every 2 seconds.

set6.name: Scrap
set6.description: At the start of combat, components held by Scrap champions turn into full items for the rest of combat. Additionally, your team also gains Health for each component equipped in your army, including those that are part of a full item.

set6.name: Sister
set6.description: 2Sisters gain empowered skills to compete with each other. Vi's ability range increases by 2 hexes. Jinx gains 40% Attack Speed for 3 seconds after scoring a takedown.

sets.description: Sisters gain empowered skills to compete with each other. Vi's ability range increases by 2 hexes. Jinx gains 40% Attack Speed for 3 seconds after scoring a takedown.

set6.name: Sniper
set6.description: Snipers gain +1 Attack Range and deal bonus damage for each hex between themselves and their target.

set6.name: Socialite
set6.description: Socialite reveal a spotlight on the battlefield. The unit standing in the spotlight at the start of combat gains unique bonuses.

sets.description: and heal for 33% of all damage they deal

set6.name: Syndicate
set6.description: Certain allies are cloaked in shadows, gaining 55 Armor, 55 Magic Resist and 20% Omnivamp (healing for a percentage of all damage dealt.)

sets.description: The Syndicate champion with the lowest percent Health
Your whole team, and the effects are increased by 60%

set6.name: Transformer
set6.description: 1Jayce adopts melee form when placed in the front 2 rows, and ranged form in the back 2 rows.

sets.description: Jayce adopts melee form when placed in the front 2 rows, and ranged form in the back 2 rows.

set6.name: Twinshot
set6.description: Twinshots gain bonus Attack Damage. When a Twinshot attacks, they have a chance to attack twice instead.

set6.name: Yordle
set6.description: 3After each player combat, a random Yordle is added to your bench for free.

sets.description: After each player combat, a random Yordle is added to your bench for free.
And Yordle's Abilities cost 25% less to cast.

set6.name: Yordle-Lord
set6.description: Veigar is summoned from Yordle Portal when every Yordle is 3-star.

set6.5.name: Chemtech
set6.5.description: After dropping below 75% Health, Chemtech champions become chem-powered, gaining Attack Speed, 20% damage reduction, and regenerating a percentage of their maximum Health each second for 8 seconds.

set6.5.name: Clockwork
set6.5.description: Your team has increased Attack Speed, with an additional increase per augment in the Hexcore.

set6.5.name: Debonair
set6.5.description: Debonair champions gain bonus Health and Ability Power. If there is a Debonair VIP in play, they activate their unique bonus. (Sell the old VIP for a chance to see a new one in your Shop.)

set6.5.name: Enforcer
set6.5.description: Enforcers stun enemies at the start of combat. The target breaks free after 4 seconds, or after losing 40% of their maximum Health. Enforcers will not try to stun enemies who are immune to crowd control effects.

sets.description: The enemy who has the most Health.
And the enemy who dealt the most damage last combat.

An ally from the bench can be fed to Tahm Kench once per planning phase, permanently granting him either Ability Power, Health, Armor, or Magic Resist.

To feed, hold an ally from the bench over Tahm Kench until his mouth opens, then release.

set6.5.name: Hextech
set6.5.description: At the start of combat and every 5 seconds afterwards, the Hexcore sends out a pulse that charges up allied Hextech champions with a shield for 4 seconds. While the shield is active, attacks deal bonus magic damage on hit. This shield does not stack.

sets.description: At the start of combat, the Mastermind grants the 2 allies directly in front of him 40 of their starting Mana.

set6.5.name: Mercenary
set6.5.description: Gain a treasure chest that opens when you win combat against a player. At the start of each planning phase vs a player, dice rolls add loot to the chest. The longer you've gone without opening the chest, the luckier the dice.

sets.description: Upon winning, roll a 3rd dice that grants bonus loot.

set6.5.name: Mutant
set6.5.description:
Mutants gain unique bonuses. These are different each game.

Cybernetic Enhancement grants bonus stats to Mutants with at least 1 item.

Voracious Appetite strengthens Mutants on each ally's death.

Voidborne executes targets below a Health threshold and deals true damage.

Hyper-Adrenal Glands give a chance for Mutants to deal additional attacks.

Synaptic Web reduces the Mana cost of Mutants’ Abilities.

Bio-Leeching grants Omnivamp (healing for a percentage of damage dealt) to your team.

Metamorphosis grants stacking bonuses to Mutants at regular intervals.

sets.description:
This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 unique Rival unit, as Rivals refuse to work together.

Vi's mana cost is reduced by 20.

Jinx gains 40% Attack Speed for 3 seconds after scoring a takedown.

set6.5.description: At the start of combat, components held by Scrap champions turn into full items for the rest of combat. Also, your team gains a shield for each component equipped by your team, including those that are part of a full item.

set6.5.description: Socialite reveal a spotlight on the battlefield. The unit standing in the spotlight at the start of combat gains unique bonuses.

set6.5.description: Veigar is summoned from Yordle Portal when every Yordle is 3-star.

set6.5.description: Arcanists increase the Ability Power of your team.

set6.5.description:
Innate: When combat starts, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.

Assassins' Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.

set6.5.name: Bodyguard
set6.5.description: Bodyguards have increased Armor. Shortly after combat begins, Bodyguards gain a shield and taunt adjacent enemies, forcing them to attack the Bodyguard.

set6.5.name: Bruiser
set6.5.description: Your team gains bonus maximum Health. Bruisers gain double the bonus.

set6.5.name: Challenger
set6.5.description: Challengers get bonus Attack Speed. Upon scoring a takedown, Challengers dash to a new target and double this bonus for 2.5 seconds.

set6.5.name: Colossus
set6.5.description: Innate: Colossi are bigger, more powerful, and immune to crowd control effects. However, each Colossus requires 2 team slots.

set6.5.name: Enchanter
set6.5.description: Your team has bonus Magic Resist. Enchanters gain bonus healing and shielding.

set6.5.name: Innovator
set6.5.description: Innovators build a mechanical companion to join the battle. The companion receives bonus Health and Attack Damage based on allied Innovators' star levels.

set6.5.name: Scholar
set6.5.description: Your team gains Mana every 2 seconds.

set6.5.name: Sniper
set6.5.description:
Innate: Snipers gain 1 hex Attack Range. 

Snipers deal bonus damage for each hex between themselves and their target.

set6.5.name: Striker
set6.5.description: Strikers gain bonus Attack Damage.

sets.description: Jayce adopts melee form when placed in the front 2 rows, and ranged form in the back 2 rows.

set6.5.name: Twinshot
set6.5.description: Twinshots gain bonus Attack Damage. When a Twinshot attacks, they have a chance to attack twice instead.
